thumb.name: In Your Arms Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBruce.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOf all the places %3Cbr%3Ein the world I like...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI like being in your arms %3Cbr%3Ethe best!

thumb.name: Bears and Basket
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMicky. of all the places%3Cbr%3Ein the world I like%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI like being with you%3Cbr%3Ethe best!

thumb.name: If We Have Each Other Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBetsy --%3Cbr%3Eany joy.%3Cbr%3Eany wish. %3Cbr%3Eany dream%3Cbr%3Ecan be ours...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...as long as we have%3Cbr%3Eeach other...%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Iris and Butterfly
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EI love you. Sandy!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;and every day. I fall in love with you all over again!%3Cbr%3E
